direction: A high-end, modern software dashboard aesthetic utilizing a 'Bento Box' layout. The design focuses on clarity, soft rounded corners, and a high-contrast palette of charcoal and warm yellow to create an approachable yet professional user experience.

background.description: Clean, airy background with subtle warm gradients to add depth without clutter.

primary.description: A soft, sage green used for primary actions, highlights, and status indicators.

secondary.description: Deep charcoal/black for strong visual hierarchy, navigation, and text.

neutral.description: A range of greys to handle borders, secondary text, and inactive states.

heading.usage: Used for page titles, large hero metrics, and section headers to provide a modern, high-tech feel.

body.usage: Used for all descriptive text, labels, and UI elements where readability is paramount.

borderRadius.description: Generous border radii are a core characteristic of this style, conveying softness and modernity.

shadows.description: Shadows should be almost invisible, used only to provide a slight lift on interactive elements.

cards.style: Flat, bento-style layout with large (32px) border radius. Background is pure white or extremely light grey.
cards.headerStyle: Clean, bold headers with secondary info placed in small, high-contrast badges.

navigation.style: Pill-shaped top navigation or minimal sidebar. Active states use dark charcoal background with white text.

buttons.style: Full pill-shaped (9999px) or highly rounded (16px+). No sharp corners.
buttons.ghost: Transparent background with charcoal border or text.

progressIndicators.style: Thick, rounded progress bars. Utilize patterned fills for 'projected' or secondary progress types.

charts.style: Minimalist charts with rounded ends on bars. Use primary yellow for active data points.
charts.axes: Hidden or very light grey lines.

calendar.style: Timeline or grid view with clear typography. Events are represented by rounded rectangles with accent border-left indicators.

avatars.style: Large, circular avatars with a soft border or subtle glow. Contextual info placed directly below or to the right.

inputs.style: Soft background (#F5F5F5), minimal border, and large corner radius. Focus state uses primary yellow highlight.

badges.style: Small pill shapes with low-opacity backgrounds or solid primary/secondary fills.
